summary: Just an imperial girl that can\'t stand imperial policy
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.minus.com/iR0XX0sTLbEXs.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][FONT=Edwardian Script ITC][size=30][B][color=Firebrick][u]Dometria\'s Best Friend[/B][/size][/u][/color]
[size=20][color=Firebrick][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24293]Rebecca[/url]
[u]Rebecca\'s Friends[/u][/font][/size][/color]
[color=Firebrick][font=Vivaldi][size=5][url=http://http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24369]Alexandra[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24139]BreeLynn[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24174]Fayleen[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24248]Jazmin[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24145]Arianna[/url][/color]
[b][u][/size][/font]
[font=Vivaldi][color=Firebrick][size=6]Required Mod[/u][/b]
ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]
[/center][/font][/color][/size]
[center][img]http://i.minus.com/ibqIgnW7du6gbq.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][u][b]
[font=Vivaldi][color=Firebrick][size=6]Optional Mods[/u][/b]
Ashara Princess of the Woods by SydneyB
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18008]Ashara Princess of the Woods[/url]
Ashara Dimonized Dress and Dragon jewelry by SydneyB
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14146]Sydneys Jewelry[/url][/size][/color]
[size=5][color=yellow]I highly recommend this armor, SydneyB put it together very nicely and you can mix
and match the different items the way you want.  She did an outstanding job on it!
[/center][/font][/color][/size]
[center][img]http://i.minus.com/iW0mvX56urDR3.jpg[/img][/center]
[font=Vivaldi][color=Firebrick][size=6]
[center]\"Thank you[/size][/color]
[color=Deepskyblue][size=5]to the modders out there for making this game that much more enjoyable.\"[/color][/size]
[color=firebrick][size=6]
Special Thanks:[/color][/size]
[size=5][color=Deepskyblue] I learned how to do this from a fellow modder named BravoOskar. He graciously took the time to put up a tutorial, so that some of us could try to do something like this. [/color][/size]

[size=5][color=firebrick]Questions You Might Ask:[/color][/size]
[size=5][color=Deepskyblue]Q. I downloaded Dometria and she doesn\'t look like your pictures.
A. I am using several mods that make characters in game look better. 
[/color][/size]
[color=firebrick][size=6]Suggested Character Texture Mods:[/color][/size]
[color=Deepskyblue][size=5][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812]Better Females by BellaGail[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869]Covereyes by Mr Lenski[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3563]Coverwomen by Mr Lenski[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]Calientes Female Body Mod by Caliente[/url]
[/center][/font][/color][/size]
author: Sharky Borror
